Free Figma Template

Web Design Agency Landing Page

If you want to download this template and edit it in Figma, click the link underneatht the image to begin the download process.

Download

About This Template

This is a landing page for a web design agency that I made in Figma.

This landing page contains calls to action like a set up an appointment button. This page also contains a services section that outlines three basic services offered. They are website design, search engine optimization, and web development.

Free Website Design Resources

This is a free web design resources I made. If you like it please feel free to download it and use at your will. Also please consider linking to my website if you're going to use it for commercial purposes.
